Command.Description: Resets the RadioSkyPipeLogger

Parameter.Name: Mode
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: Defaults, Soft

Command.Description: Pings the RadioSkyPipeLogger Controller
Gets the configuration of the RadioSkyPipeLogger in XML
Starts the Instrument
Stops the Instrument
Gets the Version of the Controller OS
Captures all A2D channels

Parameter.Name: SampleInterval
Parameter.Tooltip: The time interval between data samples (1 to 1000 seconds)

Parameter.Name: CapturePeriod
Parameter.Tooltip: The total time of data capture (0 to 1000000 seconds, 0 is continuous)

Parameter.Name: Filter
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: PassThrough, SimpleIntegrator

Parameter.Name: RealtimeUpdate
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls updates on every sample read. Allowed values: true or false

Parameter.Name: VerboseLogging
Parameter.Tooltip: Controls verbose Command execution logging. Allowed values: true or false

Command.Description: Gets all A2D channels in one operation
Get a single data file from the local file system

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The filename to be processed

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Choices: RadioSkyPipe, Stardata, TimestampedCommaSeparated, TimestampedTabSeparated, IndexedCommaSeparated, IndexedTabSeparated, JohnCook
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: RadioSkyPipe, Stardata, TimestampedCommaSeparated, TimestampedTabSeparated, IndexedCommaSeparated, IndexedTabSeparated, JohnCook

Parameter.Name: Filter
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: PassThrough, SimpleIntegrator

Command.Description: Saves the Command Log in the specified file

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/CommandLog

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: FormattedStardata, CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current chart as an image in the specified file

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/Chart

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: JPG, PNG (PNG preferred)

Parameter.Name: Width
Parameter.Tooltip: The width of the image in pixels (32 to 3000)

Parameter.Name: Height
Parameter.Tooltip: The height of the image in pixels (32 to 3000)

Command.Description: Saves the current processed data in the specified file and format

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/ProcessedData

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: FormattedStardata, CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current raw data in the specified file and format

Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/RawData

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: FormattedStardata, CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current MetaData in the specified file and format

Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/Metadata

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: FormattedStardata, CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current Event Log in the specified file and format

Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/EventLog

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: FormattedStardata, CompressedStardata

Command.Description: Saves the current Regional Map as an image in the specified file

Parameter.Name: Filename
Parameter.Tooltip: The pathname/filename to be saved without file extension e.g. archive/RegionalMap

Parameter.Name: Timestamp
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Parameter.Name: Format
Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: PNG, JPG, GIF

Parameter.Tooltip: Allowed values: true or false, to control the addition of a timestamp to the filename

Command.Description: Copies the most recent ResponseValue to the host Clipboard

Instrument.Name: RadioSkyPipe Logger
Instrument.Description: A Starbase client for a local RadioSkyPipe

DAO.Name: RadioSkyPipeLogger
DAO.Description: Delivers data from a local RadioSkyPipe instance

Output.Name: CommandLog
Output.Description: The Command Log produced by the DAO

Output.Name: ProcessedData
Output.Description: The Processed Data produced by the DAO

Output.Name: RawData
Output.Description: The Raw Data produced by the DAO

Output.Name: EventLog
Output.Description: The Event Log produced by the DAO

Output.Name: RegionalMap
Output.Description: The RegionalMap produced by the DAO

Output.Name: MetaData
Output.Description: The Meta Data produced by the DAO

Output.Name: Configuration
Output.Description: The Configuration produced by the DAO

Output.Name: CommandLexicon
Output.Description: The Instrument Command Lexicon produced by the DAO

Output.Name: XML
Output.Description: The Instrument XML Configuration produced by the DAO
